name: 10 Seconds Cycle Strikers
description:
A Space Invaders inspired bullet hell in which your weapons change randomly every 10 seconds. Music and visuals will change too, as you try to survive infinite waves of enemy spaceships.

Download the executable for better visuals

Controls:

Movement: WASD
Shooting (if auto shoot disabled): Spacebar
Pause: P


Programming: Gerbil & LostHuman

Visuals: Gerbil & RGBResist

Music & Audio: 619SECTION (https://soundcloud.com/ugzen/)

Made for the Bullet Hell Jam 2021

Third-party resources used: 
https://seansleblanc.itch.io/better-minimal-webgl-template
